sentences.en: A symptom, not a disease, jaundice simply announces that something is wrong with me.
sentences.cn: 黄疸是一种症状, 不是一种病, 只能说明我有毛病了.

sentences.en: Arterial disease in which chronic high blood pressure is the primary symptom.
sentences.cn: 动脉压是心脏输出血液与血管对血液的阻力共同产生的.

sentences.en: At any moment the tension inside you was liable to translate itself into some visible symptom.
sentences.cn: 你内心的紧张,随时可能转变成什么一目了然的症候.

sentences.en: Depressive disorders are a heterogeneous group of conditions that share the common symptom of dysphoric mood.
sentences.cn: 抑郁性疾患包括一组具有心情忧郁这一共同症状的若干情况.

sentences.en: High interest rates are a symptom of a weak economy.
sentences.cn: 高利率是经济疲软的征兆.

sentences.en: Industrial class conflict was a symptom of anomie.
sentences.cn: 工业阶级矛盾就是一种反常的症象.

sentences.en: It is probable that the medication will suppress the symptom without treating the condition.
sentences.cn: 这种药物有可能治标不治本。

sentences.en: One of the most common symptoms of schizophrenia is hearing imaginary voices.
sentences.cn: 精神分裂症最常见的症状之一是幻听。

sentences.en: The disappearance of jobs is a symptom of a deeper socioeconomic change.
sentences.cn: 工作岗位减少是社会经济发生进一步变化的一个征兆。

sentences.en: There was outwardly a certain cynicism about him, a sure symptom of an inherent moral decay.
sentences.cn: 乍一看,他的确有些玩世不恭, 肯定受到旧的腐朽道德的侵蚀.

sentences.en: This kind of disease is companied with the symptom of high fever.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病常以发高烧的症状出现.

sentences.en: Was the noise a cause of the illness, or were the complaints about noise merely a symptom?
sentences.cn: 噪音是病因呢, 还是对噪音的抱怨仅仅是一种症状 呢 ?

sentences.en: Was this clash the symptom of disintegrating authority?
sentences.cn: 这次冲突是否是权威瓦解的征兆 呢 ?

sentences.en: What appearance is the symptom of hepatitis?
sentences.cn: 肝炎的症状是什么样子的？

sentences.en: What does the general symptom of the cold have?
sentences.cn: 感冒的一般症状有哪些?

sentences.en: What does the skin allergy symptom that blood disease causes have?
sentences.cn: 血液病引起的皮肤过敏症状有哪些?

sentences.en: You think being afraid of me is a symptom of a serious ailment?
sentences.cn: 你认为害怕我是一种严重疾病的症状?

trans.tran_en: something wrong with your body or mind which shows that you have a particular illness
